name: S_4_6_4_Manage_Enrollment_in_Public_Health_Programs
title: S.4.6.4 Manage Enrollment in Public Health Programs (Function)
description: Provide the ability to enroll in public health programs.
purpose:
The systems should support the ability of a PHR Account Holder to enroll in all available local, state and federal public health programs.

Example(s): A PHR Account Holder would like to enroll in a local or regional maternal health program to receive care for pregnancy.

statement.label: S.4.6.4#01
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability for a PHR Account Holder to manage an enrollment in public health programs.

statement.label: S.4.6.4#02
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability to capture administrative information necessary to enroll in public health programs.

statement.label: S.4.6.4#03
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to render public health programs sorted by enrollment date and category.

statement.label: S.4.6.4#04
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to capture notices from public health program offices according to organizational policy and/or jurisdictional law.
